ns:common.topic.description:
LPJ Version 1: The OriginalLanguage: Fortran-77Main development 
period: 1997-2004Citations to refer to the code: Sitch et al. (2003); Gerten 
et al. (2004)LPJ_v1.1The originally published LPJ version 
used in Sitch et al. (2003).We provide this version of LPJ only for 
evaluatory purposes. It features a frequently too low water stress on vegetation 
due to insufficient formulations in the water balance. For scientifc 
applications we recommend to use the latest version, LPJ version 3.
rdfs:label: LPJ v1.1
ns:type.object.name: LPJ v1.1
